channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 07:34 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 07:34 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 07:32 Threat of artillery shelling! Now the Myrivska territorial community is under artillery shelling. Take cover!
item.description: 🔴 07:32 Threat of artillery shelling! Now the Myrivska territorial community is under artillery shelling. Take cover! #Myrivska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 06:45 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been lifted. Please note that the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 06:45 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been lifted. Please note that the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
